sentences.sContent: As you hum your songs, the water turn to ice above our home.
sentences.sContent_eng: As you hum your songs, the water turn to ice above our home.
sentences.sCn: 歌词大意： 当你哼你的歌，水变成冰上面我们的家。

sentences.sContent: Behind us, the Stockholm, an island in itself, nosed into the ice almost up to the stern.
sentences.sContent_eng: Behind us, the Stockholm, an island in itself, nosed into the ice almost up to the stern.
sentences.sCn: 我们身后是斯德哥尔摩号，她本身也是一座海岛，船身到船尾几乎完全插入到冰块中。

sentences.sContent: We can change ice into water by heating it.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can change ice into water by heating it.
sentences.sCn: 通过加热我们可以把冰变成水。

phrases.pCn: 在狱中；有成功或胜利把握；搁置起来的；暂缓
打破沉默，打破僵局；破冰
（英）冰糕（用果汁等制成的）；（非雪压成的）水冻冰块

words.tran: 冰冷的；冷淡的；结满冰的
冷藏工人；给冷藏货车装冰的机器

trans.tranOther: water that has frozen into a solid state
